about_the_game:
RESBS is a first-person space survival simulation where you and your friends cooperate to survive in zero gravity on a space station.Your movement is completely free, without any restrictions on direction.

When your crew encounters an emergency during a mission and loses contact with Earth and resources, you need all the materials at your disposal to survive in a vacuum.
·Growing vegetables in space
·Exploring abandoned space stations
·Searching for supplies
·Repairing space capsules destroyed by space debris.
·If necessary, you even need to do the docking of the capsule.

The outer equipment and outer shell of the space station are often damaged by space debris. You need to wear a heavy space suit to repair the outer shell of the space station in the vacuum.
In short, you need to arrange your resources properly, expand your farm, and acquire more equipment so that you can successfully reach the rescue or return to Earth!

In short, you need to arrange your resources properly, expand your farm, and acquire more equipment so that you can successfully reach the rescue or return to Earth!
name: RESBS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K/AMD Ryzen 7-2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: RESBS is a first-person space survival simulation where you and your friends cooperate to survive in zero gravity on a space station!
